title: Friends with the Monsters
description: Gather round close, for I have a secret to tell.  Late at night, while everyone is sleeping, dreaming of white knights and fairytales. I’m making friends with the monsters.  They call to me, like finds like, right? My biggest secret, I’m the scariest monster I know.  I think I’m the bad guy.  MFMM Reverse Harem novel with adult themes not recommended for those under 18.
author: Albany Walker
